(def chunker (make-treebank-chunker "resources/models/en-chunker.bin"))" "(name-find (tokenize "Movies directed by Christopher Nolan"))" "(name-find (tokenize "Movies with Jenifer Lopez"))" "(def director ("Movies directed by Christopher Nolan"))" "(def director "Movies directed by Christopher Nolan")" "(chunker (pos-tag (tokenize "Movies directed by Christopher Nolan")))" "(def director "Movies with Jenifer Lopez")" "(chunker (pos-tag (tokenize director)))" "(chunker (pos-tag (tokenize "Movies acted by Anne Hathway")))" "(require '[opennlp.tools.filter])" "(map :tag (chunker (pos-tag (tokenize "Movies acted by Anne Hathway"))))" "(require '[server.model.metrics :as metrics])" "(metrics/levenshtein "directed by" "director")"], :remote []}}
